-----

Game Control:
1. Use 'mouse' to move the cursor
2. [Esc] to pause the game

-----

What the game is about:
The game is inspired by Black Dollar Scam I watched on YouTube
a long time ago. Combined with 'Touhou' genre with a spin-off
like the 'Stay-on-circle' rule.
